LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine200N.desc: Make Inaho a white rice. The by-product bag crushes and disappears.
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachineGR200N.de: 稲穂を脱穀精米してもち米にする。副産物は粉砕して消滅させる。
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachineBR200N.de: 稲穂を脱穀精米して玄米にする。副産物は粉砕して消滅させる。
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine200C.desc: Make rice earn rice. The by-product bag is converted to a small amount of chemfuel.
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachineGR200C.de: 稲穂を脱穀精米してもち米にする。副産物は少量のバイオ科学燃料に変換される。
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachineBR200C.de: 稲穂を脱穀精米して玄米にする。副産物は少量のバイオ科学燃料に変換される。
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine10.label: Inaho⇒White rice(10)
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine10.descri: Inaho is divided into White rice, Straw, Outher hull and Rice bran.
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine50.label: Inaho⇒White rice(50)
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine50.descri: Inaho is divided into White rice, Straw, Outher hull and Rice bran.
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine100.label: Inaho⇒White rice(100)
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine100.descr: Inaho is divided into White rice, Straw, Outher hull and Rice bran.
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine200.label: Inaho⇒White rice(200)
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine200.descr: Inaho is divided into White rice, Straw, Outher hull and Rice bran.
LanguageData.MakeThreshingRiceMillingMachine10_4.desc: 稲穂を脱穀してもち米、藁、籾殻にわける
